sqlMap.select: select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_sample T where 1 = 1 and id = #id#

select * from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_sample T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.productid = #productid#
T.warehousename = #warehousename#
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
order by A.updatedate desc, A.id desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select count(*) from ( select T.*, (select P.tradename from etb_product P where P.id = T.productid) as tradename from etb_sample T where 1 = 1
T.status = #status#
T.productid = #productid#
T.warehousename = #warehousename#
) A where 1 = 1
A.tradename like '%$tradename$%' ESCAPE '/'
